fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater

Class HeaterCyPhy

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.HeaterCyPhy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, HeaterExternalControlI, HeaterInternalControlI, HeaterTemperatureI, HeaterUserI

    public class HeaterCyPhy
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements HeaterUserI, HeaterInternalControlI
    The class Heater implements a heater component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       currentState != null
 invariant       targetTemperature == null || targetTemperature.getMeasurementUnit().equals(TEMPERATURE_UNIT)
 invariant       targetTemperature == null || targetTemperature.getData() >= MIN_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData() && targetTemperature.getData() <= MAX_TARGET_TEMPERATURE.getData()
 invariant       currentPowerLevel == null || currentPowerLevel.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       currentPowerLevel == null || currentPowerLevel.getData() >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevel.getData() <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL.getData()

    Invariants

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        protected static int NUMBER_OF_STANDARD_THREADS

               throws java.lang.Exception
        create a new heater.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     heaterUserInboundPortURI != null && !heaterUserInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()

 post    getTargetTemperature().equals(STANDARD_TARGET_TEMPERATURE)
 post    getExecutionMode().isStandard()
        Parameters:
        heaterUserInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for user interactions.
        heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for internal control.
        heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for external control.
        heaterSensorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component sensors.
        heaterActuatorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component actuators.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

        reflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the reflection inbound port of the component.
        heaterUserInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for user interactions.
        heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for internal control.
        heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for external control.
        heaterSensorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component sensors.
        heaterActuatorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component actuators.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

                      fr.sorbonne_u.components.utils.tests.TestScenario testScenario,
                      java.lang.String localArchitectureURI,
                      double accelerationFactor)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        create a new heater for test executions with simulation .

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     reflectionInboundPortURI != null && !reflectionInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterUserInboundPortURI != null && !heaterUserInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI != null && !heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterSensorInboundPortURI != null && !heaterSensorInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     heaterActuatorInboundPortURI != null && !heaterActuatorInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     executionMode != null && executionMode.isSimulationTest()
 pre     testScenario == null
 pre     localArchitectureURI != null && !localArchitectureURI.isEmpty()
 pre     accelerationFactor > 0.0
 post    !on()
 post    isCurrentPowerLevel(HeaterExternalControlI.MAX_POWER_LEVEL)
 post    getTargetTemperature().getMeasure().equals(STANDARD_TARGET_TEMPERATURE)
 post    getExecutionMode().equals(executionMode)
        Parameters:
        reflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the reflection inbound port of the component.
        heaterUserInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for user interactions.
        heaterInternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for internal control.
        heaterExternalControlInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component for external control.
        heaterSensorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component sensors.
        heaterActuatorInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to call the heater component actuators.
        executionMode - execution mode for the next run.
        testScenario - test scenario to be executed with this component.
        localArchitectureURI - URI of the local simulation architecture to be used in composing the global simulation architecture.
        accelerationFactor - acceleration factor for the simulation.
